attributes.death: Stabbed through the stomach with a spear by Ygritte
attributes.title: Mole's Town whore

sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Gilly is never taken to Mole's Town to seek refuge, as Gilly and Sam arrive to [[Castle Black]] much later into the storyline after the [[Battle of Castle Black|battle]] is over, without passing through the village, which is abandoned at that point.

The books mention three whores of Mole's Town: Zei, Lady Meliana, and Sky Blue Su. They are among the villagers who come to seek refuge at Castle Black. None of them interacts with Gilly. Since very little information is given about them, it is unknown if the whore in the TV show is based on any of them.

Rumors that the Mole's Town whore is named "Momo" are erroneous.

A '''Mole's Town whore''' is an unnamed minor character in the [[Season 4|fourth season]]. She is played by guest star [[Lois Winstone]].
